import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";export var clickSlice=createSlice({name:"myValue",initialState:{filter:""},reducers:{filterContacts:function filterContacts(state,action){state.filter=action.payload.text;}}});var filterContacts=clickSlice.actions.filterContacts;export{filterContacts};export var contactsSliceReducer=clickSlice.reducer;//Selectors
